ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: SAY: "HE IS God the one the most unique,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say: “He is Allah, the One and Unique;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “He is Allah, He is One.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: He is Allah, the One!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: He is Allah, the One!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: He is Allah, the One and Only;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)): "He is Allah, (the) One.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [112:1] Say: ‘He is God, One (Allāhu is the predicate of huwa, ‘He is’, and ahadun is its substitution or a second predicate).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said regarding the interpretation of Allah's saying (Say: He is Allah, the One!): '(Say: He is Allah, the One!) the people of Quraysh asked the Prophet (pbuh): "0 Muhammad! Describe for us your Lord; is He made of gold or silver?" And so Allah revealed this surah to describe His attributes and traits, saying: say to Quraysh, Muhammad: He is Allah, the One, He has no son or partner.
